title: Kev’yn
description: Kev’yn is all about family. His wife Yolanda and daughter Kev’ysha keep him on his toes. And don’t forget Percy and Lil' Chris stopping by to shake things up.
starring: Jermain Jonson, William Grant Jr., Monique Lewis, McKenzie Evans, Kyle Wilson
altHero: Kev’yn presents a tray of cupcakes to Percy and Yolanda
alt1: Percy squeezes frosting on a cupcake
alt2: Kev’yn kneels in a Colin Kaepernick jersey and Yolanda wears a “Black Wives Matter” t-shirt
alt3: the family, dressed in traditional African clothing, hosts their white friends
alt4: Kev’ysha looks annoyed on her phone
